languages.text: "Ну, я, конечно, сходил в небольшую самоволку... только не по своей воле".
"Well, I was absent without leave... but not by choice."
languages.original_text: "Ну, я, конечно, сходил в небольшую самоволку... только не по своей воле".

traits.locale_text: "Well, I was absent without leave... but not by choice."
"Well, I was absent without leave... but not by choice."
"Well, I was absent without leave... but not by choice."
"Well, I was absent without leave... but not by choice."

languages.text: “这么说吧，我确实擅离职守了一会儿……但那不是我自愿的。”
languages.original_text: "Well, I was absent without leave... but not by choice."

traits.locale_text: “这么说吧，我确实擅离职守了一会儿……但那不是我自愿的。”

languages.text: « Disons que j'ai été forcé de prendre un congé imprévu. »
languages.original_text: "Well, I was absent without leave... but not by choice."

traits.locale_text: « Disons que j'ai été forcé de prendre un congé imprévu. »

languages.text: «Bueno, admito cierta ausencia... pero fue involuntaria».
languages.original_text: "Well, I was absent without leave... but not by choice."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, admito cierta ausencia... pero fue involuntaria».

languages.text: 「いや、無断で席を空けてしまいましたが…望んだわけではありません」
languages.original_text: "Well, I was absent without leave... but not by choice."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、無断で席を空けてしまいましたが…望んだわけではありません」

languages.text: "Nun, ich war unerlaubt abwesend ... nicht durch meine freie Entscheidung."
languages.original_text: "Well, I was absent without leave... but not by choice."
